function.note: Data retrieval from Vectorbase at EMBL-EBI (European Bioinformatics Institute, Hinxton, Cambridge, UK) Identifier for records of VectorBase, following the regular expression: ^\D{4}\d{6}(\-\D{2})?$.

summary.description: Bioinformatic Resource Center focused on invertebrate vectors of human pathogens. It annotates and curates vector genomes providing a web accessible integrated resource for the research community. Currently, it contains genome information for three mosquito species: Aedes aegypti, Anopheles gambiae and Culex quinquefasciatus, a body louse Pediculus humanus and a tick species Ixodes scapularis.
summary.name: VectorBase
